page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: USK AREA - FARMS, HORTICULTURE This block has an area of flat land along the River Usk, and some hilly wooded land North of the River. The majority of the farms are family run, with intensively managed grassland for sheep, beef cattle and dairy cows. The woodlands are of mixed Coniferous and Deciduous trees for timber. Coniferous for short-term, and deciduous (oak,ash), for long-term returns. There is a small family run market garden selling flowers and plants in their shop in Usk. The Usk Agricultural College gives students an all-round training in farming including Horticulture, and garden produce is sold from the College gardens to the public.
